TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Don_Asmonga, title = Don_Asmonga, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Asmonga} }

S.FORM: Don Asmonga nalecuhan i American, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. 2 bulad 15 demiad, 1928 a mihca, Don Asmonga, miunduay. (mapatay i 2014 a mihca)
Don Asmonga nalecohan i American, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot. 2 bolad 15 demiad, 1928 a mihca, Don Asmonga, miondoay. (mapatay i 2014 a mihca)
